attributes.action: force local councils to compensate motorists whose cars are damaged as a result of speed humps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a motorist who has become continually frustrated at repair bills for my cars suspension as a result of the increasing trend for local councils to install speed humps around the city of which I travel. As well as not working these traffic calming measures are an annoyance and are costing me hundreds of pounds each year to fix or re-adjust my suspension. Because of this I petition that coucils should be liable for motorists car repairs as a result of speed hump inflicted damage.
